    Reverse digits of an integer.

    Example1: x = 123, return 321

    Example2: x = -123, return -321

    Clarify:

    1. It may stack over flow if the reversed integer is greater than the INTEGER_MAX_VALUE or smaller than INTEGER_MIN_VALUE
